MR No. 324 - The Church and Its Mission

     War is coming against the remnant because they keep the commandments of God and have the testimony of Jesus. . . . Don't yield your sacred peculiarities which distinguish you from the world, from the nominal church and backslidden Adventists. . . . The nominal churches are in darkness and corrupt. They have shut out the gifts God has placed in the church.--Letter 7, 1856, pp. 1, 2. (To "Dear Friends in Mansville," circa, 1856.)
